CostBookEntry.name: CostBookEntry
CostBookEntry.description: Represents the total cost of a product or service that’s determined based on various factors that affect a product's price. For example, when a product is manufactured, the weight of the raw material can be a cost factor based on the amount of material required and its shipping cost.

CostBookId.description: ID of the Cost Book record with which this record is associated.

CurrencyIsoCode.description: ISO code for any currency allowed by the organization. Available only for organizations with the multicurrency feature enabled.

Description.description: Description of this cost book entry record.

EffectiveFrom.description: Date and time when the cost book entry comes into effect.

EffectiveTo.description: Date and time till when the cost book entry is no longer in effect.

LastReferencedDate.description: Timestamp for when the current user last referred to this record.

LastViewedDate.description: Timestamp for when the current user last viewed a record related to this record.

Name.description: Name of the cost book entry.

ProductId.description: Required. ID of the Product2 record with which this record is associated. This field must be specified when creating Product2 records. This field can’t be changed in an update.
